author: Angela Addison
content:
Good write-up!! Groupon is already a trusted and famous deals website, why anyone will go with your new website? You must provide your customers a reason to visit your website. This can only be happen if your website will be having a unique feature.
Yo!Deals is an advanced daily deal site builder which offers unique multi-vendor and product selling feature. With multi-vendor features, admin will be able to add multiple merchants into the daily deal system who will be different yet related deals to your services. With related deals, means those deals which you are not offering but your neighbor merchant is offering. You can earn money on every deal clicked and coupon redeemed.
